description:
The apartment is located in the sought-after Chelsea neighborhood, minutes from Herald Square, Madison Square Garden, and major subway lines. Relax after a busy day of city life in our private back yard.

The apartment is located on the garden level and has a private back yard!

Nearby attractions include:
-Herald Square- 5 minute walk
-Madison Square Garden- 5 minute walk
Times Square- 10 minute walk

You will have access to the full apartment, including the kitchen, bathroom, living room, and bedroom.

Use of the outdoor space is limited to before 10 pm.

I work a few blocks away and my friend lives across the street, so we are always just a few minutes away if you need anything!

The apartment is located 5 minutes walking from the ACE, 123, NQR, LIRR, and NJ Transit trains, so getting around is very convenient.

To enter the apartment you have to walk up a few stairs and then down a one flight, so please keep this in mind if stairs are an issue for you.
name: Chelsea Flat steps from Madison Square Garden
review: this place was great bang for your buck on location.  Nothing fancy, but it was clean and cozy.  It had everything you would need.
